content.question: A planet orbits a star along an elliptical path, as shown in the figure above. How do the planet’s kinetic energy and the total mechanical energy of the star-planet system change as the planet moves from point X to point Y?

choices.label: Planet’s Kinetic Energy System’s Total Mechanical Energy Increases Remains the same
Planet’s Kinetic Energy System’s Total Mechanical Energy Increases Increases
Planet’s Kinetic Energy System’s Total Mechanical Energy Decreases Remains the same
Planet’s Kinetic EnergySystem’s Total Mechanical EnergyDecreasesDecreases

content.answer: Planet’s Kinetic Energy System’s Total Mechanical Energy Increases Remains the same
